ygData.subject: Juggling/Twisting/Mixing/Stacking, definition...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, this may sound silly, but I ve actually had people ask this, and wonder about the REAL definition of juggling/twisting/mixing/stacking.... When you
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, this may sound silly, but I've actually had people ask this, and wonder
about the "REAL" definition of juggling/twisting/mixing/stacking....

When you juggle, you start the first song. Ok easy, so far.
WHEN do you start the second?
Do you start the second immediately when the icon for that song comes up? Do
you start it immediately when you see the expected text in the textbox? (If
it sounds stupid, I've actually seen so many times where the icon does NOT
go up at the same time as the words appear in the text box). Or do you click
a song, don't wait for anything and click the next song right away? Do you
start the first song, and wait to start the second until the graphics for
the first song take effect? (i.e. the little blue sprinkles for Hymn, etc.)

Who knows, maybe I have been doing it wrong all this time (smile)

P.S. Whoever mentioned "Mixing", I like that! It fits perfectly into "music"
terminology, and is short and easy, and doesn't sound as silly as
"twisting".

Thanks,
Tim
